alert.note: Alert for Northern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 3:20AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Liberty County through 345 AM CST... At 319 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dayton Lakes, or 10 miles north of Liberty, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hardin, Kenefick, Dayton Lakes and Moss Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
